title: What are best screenshots of 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: 2020 will go down in history as one of the worst years that we have lived in. From angry Karens refusing to wear masks to anti-vaxers who oppose the vaccine trials and believe the coronavirus pandemic is a hoax, we have seen it all. Below takes a dig at all such funny moments that we witnessed during a global pandemic. Lettuce come together and fight the virus.  Not sure if you should be wearing that in public.  That isn't how Anti-virus works.  This man is doing it perfectly.  The only possible way you can travel right now.  When you've wearing that mask for too long.  Yeah that's right, stay from Corona.  This would ensure social distancing.  A restaurant came up with this idea to maintain distancing between the customers.  It might be eco-friendly but it isn't effective.  When you don't miss an opportunity to be sassy.  I hope those shoes doesn't smell.  Not sure what is the person trying to prove here.  When you need people to stay away from you.  That doesn't count I guess!  This might cause more harm than good.  Best use of customized masks.  Gotta protect your toys too.  Image Source: Google Images.

I’ll post some random screenshots I have: New Object 2. That’s how they work.  3. When you love someone truly, you become Gatsby.  4. Know these points if you want to write your novel.  5. The path of earth’s orbit actually looks like this.  6. Found somewhere.  7. Oh getting demotivated.  8. Again!  9. A place where you shall find me someday.  10.  11. sorry if this is offensive.  12. Well lol  13.  14.  15. When you see it.  16.  17.  18. When someone argued with me that earth is flat  19. When your nail art appears in the X-ray.  20. Oh no.. no .. no..  21.  22.  23.  24. Well..  25.  26.  Thank you for scrolling. Awan.
